"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf36066368721688551a00#post_54bf36066368721688551a00
[bq="Silent_Witness"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf358f6368722364891500#post_54bf358f6368722364891500
Fan-created material is crafted with more love and care than the original creators are willing to spare for the source. This is the sort of world we live in.[/bq]
Here's Fantasy Kaleidoscope for those interested; keep in mind it's a 100% *FANMADE* anime not attached to any studio:

topics.body:
Just because I enjoyed The Wolf Among, I went ahead and got myself a volume of the Fables comics. And I stumbled across _this_ in the very first issue (spoilered for content):

[spoiler]"I've always believed a truly accomplished nobleman should hone his cockmanship every bit as much as his swordsmanship."[/spoiler]

...I think I'm gonna like this series.
